page.title: 12HOUSING
page.content: Braceby and Sapperton are hamlets with 31 dwellings of which 12 are uninha- bited and approaching dereliction, 2 in Braceby are unmodernised and the remainder brought to modern standards. 4 properties are{brickbuilt,}the rest are of local{limestone.}Nearly all the inhabited properties border the road through the villages. In Sapperton 4 inhabited houses are owner occupied, in Braceby 8 are owner occupied. Other properties are occupied by tenants and the farms are worked by tenant farmers all are rented from the large local land owner The Welby family of Denton. The 7 uninhabited properties in Braceby are in 2 terraces and border a disused back lane. All other houses are detached at least 3 houses were originally 2 dwellings. There is no main drainage.Most houses have septic tanks.In Braceby 2 have earth closets.
